alert.note: Alert for Davidson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 25 at 1:58PM CST until further notice by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Cumberland River Near Edenwold affecting Davidson County. For the Cumberland River...including Edenwold...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cumberland River Near Edenwold. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 42.0 feet, Low lying areas along the river from Old Hickory Dam to near the Hermitage Golf Course begin to be inunudated, and water backs up Mansker Creek affecting portions of Moss Wright Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 42.9 feet and steady. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 42.0 feet. - Flood stage is 49.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 900 AM CST.
